results.title: Crop it like it's hot!
results.text: Very short! When is it considered a crop? I don’t wear high waisted pants, so to me it’s cropped. I usually wear a small, or medium but sized up to a large for the length. Even the large is still short. The material itself is very thin and lightweight.

results.title: Short tee but not cropped
results.text: Great tee for summer. I sized up for comfort and it fits really well.

results.title: Buy it! Consider sizing up!
results.text: These are the BEST shirts!! They are a re-buy for me. I sized up to a L. You can dress them up or down. They wash up great!

results.title: Target stop making everythung short!
results.text: I really wanted to love this shirt cause the color is one of my favorites.. seems like the “shrunken” style is taking over everything… I was very hesitant to buy due to it being shorter and I am top heavy.. I’m was hoping it would just cover enough.. but nope… shows my stomach.. target being back the normal length shirts!! Not everyone wants to show off their stomachs!!!!

results.title: Good casual option
results.text: The cut of the shirt is good but the white is a bit see through

results.title: Great shirt!
results.text: This is a great quality shirt. I love the shorter length of it, but that it’s not cropped. It washes up well but I do hang dry.

results.title: Great shirt!
results.text: This is a great quality shirt. I love the shorter length of it, but that it’s not cropped. It washes up well but I do hang dry.

results.title: Great shirt!
results.text: This is a great quality shirt. I love the shorter length of it, but that it’s not cropped. It washes up well but I do hang dry.

results.title: Great shirt!
results.text: This is a great quality shirt. I love the shorter length of it, but that it’s not cropped. It washes up well but I do hang dry.

results.title: Perfectly "long" cropped
results.text: Perfect “long cropped” for us who want to look cute but not like a teenie bopper… wish I bought them all in every color. Perfect fit!

results.title: Love the fit!
results.text: These shirts are thin but breathable and so soft! It's the perfect crop tee that looks so much better with high rise jeans than regular tees. I love that it hugs my chest but stays loose at the midsection. Makes it comfortable but stylish!

results.title: Cute!
results.text: These shirts are so cute and comfy! Comfortable for everyday wear and workout wear!

results.title: Didn't like
results.text: After the first wash my shirt already has little holes on it.

results.title: deodorant bleached the shirt
results.text: I really like the fit and color of this shirt. Although, i had put on deodorant prior to putting on and found that it had bleached the shirt?? i’ve never had this happen before!! i do use a clinical strength deodorant, so am not sure if it was due to the strength in this vs standard deodorant. i was disappointed at first but due to wearing it for the day, i had gotten a wet towel and soaked the areas that had been altered in color, in which it had gotten it out. just a weird reaction and i have purchased clothes from this brand before. so don’t be alarmed, but give yourself time to treat the weird reaction.
